players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Bob was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "I'm shocked that Bob is dead. We need to discuss and figure out who might be behind this."
You: "I agree Diana, this is terrible news about Bob. With only three of us left, we need to be very careful about our vote today since the mafia only needs to eliminate one more person to win."
Charlie: "Based on my investigation last night, Diana is the mafioso. We should vote for her to save the town."
Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso based on my investigation. Alice, let's vote her out to protect the town."
You: "Charlie, if you're really the detective, why didn't you mention your investigation in your first message? You only claimed to investigate Diana after I spoke, which seems suspicious."
Diana: "Charlie, your late accusation against me is suspicious, just like Alice said. Maybe you're the one hiding something. We should vote for you instead."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Bob

players.name: Charlie

You: "Diana is the mafioso based on my investigation. Alice, let's vote her out to protect the town."
Alice: "Charlie, if you're really the detective, why didn't you mention your investigation in your first message? You only claimed to investigate Diana after I spoke, which seems suspicious."
Diana: "Charlie, your late accusation against me is suspicious, just like Alice said. Maybe you're the one hiding something. We should vote for you instead."

Alice: "I agree Diana, this is terrible news about Bob. With only three of us left, we need to be very careful about our vote today since the mafia only needs to eliminate one more person to win."
